lenders.name: Radiology Network
lenders.loan_because: radRounds Radiology Network hopes to donate its resources and funds to entrepreneurs and organizations (NGOs and non-profits) that aim to improve global health.
lenders.occupational_info: radRounds Radiology Network is a radiology and medical imaging professional network for building relationships in clinical practice, education, career, research, and industry.  We thousand of medical imaging professional and physician (radiologists) members.  radRounds.org is our non-profit social venture arm which runs this KIVA page and is dedicated completely to supporting and raising venture funds to help improve access to quality care, availability of low-cost medical imaging technologies abroad, and effectively to improve global healthcare delivery.

lenders.name: International Radiology
lenders.loan_because: We aim to improve access to quality care, availability of high-tech medical imaging in regions needing critical diagnostic imaging services, and to effectively aid in the practice of medicine abroad in resource poor settings.  We support all individuals and organizations who also share our passion for improving healthcare and are interested in medical imaging technology.
lenders.occupational_info:
We are a nonprofit organization providing radiology interpretation and imaging expertise to humanitarian medical organizations as well as physicians in developing world. Our group is comprised of subspecialized academic radiologists, radiology residents and fellows, other healthcare professionals and imaging technologists.

We offer:

    * Interpretation of radiology studies obtained by humanitarian medical organizations and medical missions.
    * Interpretation of radiology studies for physicians requiring primary reading.
    * Secondary consultation on studies obtained and reviewed elsewhere.
    * 3D reconstruction or imaging modifications such as for surgical planning.
    * Education of imaging related topics.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that I am fortunate to live in the society that I do and that wealth is based on the backs of other less fortunate societies so I owe some responsibility.
In the past it has been difficult to assist other than through religious groups who all push their own agendas.
lenders.occupational_info:
Aoteroa/New Zealand was isolated from the rest  of the world until only about 1000 years ago when the first people (Tangata Whenua or Maori) arrived. Europeans did not discover it until 300 years ago. Before people there were no mammals and many birds had filled that role and nested on the ground and many were flightless. There were relatively few plant species. Since settlement, especially white (Pakeha) colonisation, many animals and plants have been brought here. Many have become serious pests (there are now as many 'weeds' as there are native plants!).
My job is in pest control administration. We try to minimise the effects of pests on our ecosystem and identify new pests and attempt to eradicate them before they spread.
I work for a regional council.

lenders.occupational_info:
I take multiple classes a day to finish my Associates degree as well as my Culinary degree. I hope to pursue an additional degree in Business after finishing my AA.

Meanwhile I work as a maid and as a personal chef.

lenders.name: Devashini
lenders.occupational_info: I produce regional conferences and training programs, within the finance & lifesciences industries, in Asia

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better and more useful thing to do with the money I have than to give it to someone who needs a boost to improve their lot in life.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I believe that supporting the success of others makes them more likely to help others in turn, and makes me very happy!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a resort and my job is to hire and assist the people that work there.

lenders.name: Yoke
lenders.loan_because:
need to buy more raw materials to surviving this home industry.
Also I have 67 employees to pay salary by the end of this month.
lenders.occupational_info:
i organize widowers and home broken, school broken women, to make clove cigarretes tobacco and sell it at local area.
This work help them so much to cover their live every month, some of them be able to go to school again after they work with us.

lenders.name: Buzz
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team who answer questions, solve problems and direct calls for a local government authority.

lenders.name: Phil Richards
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves and their community by engaging in an economic activity.
lenders.occupational_info: It is just a means to an end.

lenders.name: Selina
lenders.loan_because: I care and realize the importance of irradicating global poverty not just for the poor themselves but for the environment and our future.
lenders.occupational_info: I am attending UCLA and majoring in Geography/Environmental Studies. I plan on being an environmental lawyer.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.occupation: REMAX Capital City, Affinity Properties offers buy

lenders.name: Erika & Victor
lenders.occupation: High Class Janitor and Future Entrepreneur
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people from our country, become self sufficient.

lenders.name: Masahiro Sato
lenders.loan_because: I would like to contribute to people working in developing countries.

lenders.name: Dave Child
lenders.loan_because: I think that if I am lucky enough to be able to, I should. Few better uses of money than this!
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites for money.

lenders.name: Rishi
lenders.loan_because: This is the only way to be sure that the money is spend to the persons YOU want to help

lenders.name: Kyohei
lenders.loan_because: I feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Japanese and Waseda University student.  Next year, I'm going to start working for a bank.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I have been blessed with the means to make small loans to others and I really believe it can make a dramatic difference in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the construction industry as a Pile Driver. I install deep and heavy foundations for large buildings and bridges, and shoring for deep excavation to protect other structures and utilities.

lenders.name: Rudy
lenders.loan_because: there's so many people with less...and helping people is important.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because:
A man was walking along a coastline covered with thousands of dying starfish that had been stranded by the falling tide. He came across a woman walking in the opposite direction, picking up starfish and throwing them into the ocean.

"Why do you bother?", he asked her. " There are so many of them! You can't possibly throw back enough to make a difference."

The woman picked up another starfish, threw it into the ocean, and replied, "I made a difference to that one".

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world."  If everyone felt this way, we'd all be neighbors helping neighbors.  Everyone needs a helping hand now and again and this is not a hand out.....it's a hand up....I like that!!

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive change in the life of someone else. I want to reach out and touch someone that I would not have been able to other wise.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info:
I help plan how to put software together the same way a architect plans how to make a building.

But then I help build it too!

lenders.name: Roy
lenders.loan_because: We live very well in the US and I believe that others can benefit from my help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Spanish language interpreter in a clinic for migrant farm workers.

lenders.name: Robert Jacobi
lenders.loan_because: Ich liebe kiva, weil ich gezielt Menschen, Gruppen oder Projekte unterstützen kann. Durch das Kreditprinzip kann ich mit dem "gleichen Geld" immer mehr Menschen helfen.
lenders.occupational_info: Ich bin Berater im digitalen Marketing.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to be more productive, doing what they can do to contribute to their communities

lenders.name: Tine
lenders.loan_because: We should all share if we can. And Kivas work makes it possible to contribute where people wants to make a better life through their work.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to translate from sign language to Norwegian or English, and also the opposite way. : )

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: No one every made it on their own, we all need help.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I believe in that the poor always pay back! And I think this little lend will helping them very much, and make difference in there life.
lenders.occupational_info: I feel very lucky being a knowledge worker, love to improve my skills and proud of my work.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: Self help is much better than charity - adding ability to take control leads to self-respect and confidence.  Empowerment displaces passivity and brings equity to the equation.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to live and work in the Pacific, based in Samoa, so have a special soft spot for the Pacific Islanders.  I am an environmental scientist and look forward to returning to live in the Pacific again.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: We are all responsible for leaving things a little better than we found them.  This is in my sphere of influence and I find the opportunity to make a real impact in someone's life compelling.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: This is the most fantastic idea I've ever come across.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in media and communications. I provide the voice behind tv commercials, phone system, animations, etc.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: isabel
lenders.loan_because: I can, and is needed
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find a job, or better jobs

lenders.name: Devon
lenders.loan_because: i am a middle class north american kid; one of the richest demographics in the world.  In addition to that, i often take the money, opportunities, and resources surrounding me for granted.  this is totally unfair considering the level of poverty others live in, so this seems like the least i can do

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.occupational_info: Nursing student

lenders.name: Randa
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can all do our little part to help others who are less fortunate. It is my dream to be able to do way more one day.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find homes.

lenders.name: K. Lin
lenders.loan_because: I have an earnest desire to give back and contribute to the cycle of philanthropy. Without the help of microfinance, my parents would not have been able to emigrate to the United States and build the life our family has today.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone directly

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I want people all over the world to succeed. We are all sisters and brothers.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a teacher. Now I take photographs of beautiful people and places.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is centered around creating sustainable solutions that will meet the worlds increasing demand for feed, food & fuel.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I heard about Kiva awhile ago, but just started to get involved. I think it's a pretty cool program and I'm excited to be part of something that helps people all around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with hospitals setting up their records and computer systems. Not a bad living, it's part of helping and adding value to the lives of the people I work with.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hard-working people make a better life for themselves, and I think micro-finance is an effective way to reduce poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I grew up overseas and am currently working in Iraq.

lenders.name: HomeZirk
lenders.occupational_info: Save money by selling a home yourself.  Do it best with video and expert help.

lenders.name: Dr. Danette M. Verchér, Ph.D.
lenders.loan_because: Many Christians are afflicted with Mental Illness and then turn to alternatives ways such as drugs and alcohol in order to cope with day to day life. My giving helps further the life of another, so that they may become entrepreneur's after sobriety.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a Pastor Christian Educator, and Christian Counselor. I specialize in Chronic Mental Illness and Substance Abuse Addictions and Recovery.

Dr. Danette M. Verchér Ministries
Treasures of the Heart Int'l Ministries
Entities of A Ray of Hope Ministries Christian Center Inc.
A Religious Exempted 501(c3) Non-Profit Corporation

lenders.name: Jonathan Eastabrooks
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have more than I require and feel it a duty to assist those in need. I don't do it because of religion, guilt, or even status...I do it because it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Amnistía Internacional
lenders.occupational_info: Trabajamos para derefender los derechos humanos

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: it gives me pleasure to help others help themself, their family.. using their own ideas & abilities to improve life & community.
lenders.occupational_info: listening, indentifying, responding to the requests, needs, questions of peoples worldwide hoping or doing business with the company I  work for.
